page.title: 16 GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content:
"It" is a game where you chase people and there are two homes and you run from one to the other. When you get in the homes you can't get caught by the person who is chasing the other people. "Stuck in the Mud" is a game like "It" but when you have been caught you stand still until someone comes under your arm to free you. You have three "lives" and when you have used your "lives" you are the person who chases the other people. "Catch" is a game where you have a ball and you catch it with your hands. "Double Dutch" is a game with two skipping ropes which turn alternately and you jump at twice the speed of a single skipping rope turning.
By Sally Skeldon.
